Text: RE Add new userpst Lisa Please complete the attached file as discussed over the phone Frank OATI Original Message From Gang Lisa To OATI Email Cc Thome Jennifer Thompson Virginia Sent PM Subject Add new user Please add a new user for read only access as follows User Name VolMgmt Password pdxhou Please contact me at My email address is for questions In addition please delete the following individuals name as they are no longer working at Enron Cara Semperger Mike Purcell Serena Bishop Thank You This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

OATI Etag Minimum Requirements PST Time is running very short Is your company prepared for Etag These are the minimum REQUIRED steps that must be completed prior to March All entities must update the NERC Registry at a CAs and TPs must designate PORs and PODs that are valid on tags b PSEs must designate associated scheduling PORs and PODs See or inquire with NERC for details All OATI Users must have functioning OATI Digital Certificates a Without the certificate you cannot access Etag after March at all b Inquire internally to determine if a supervisor has already contacted us b To begin the process of acquiring OATI Digital Certificates please complete this document and send it to OATI repositoryCompanyInformationdoc Failure to complete these steps will result in a partial or complete lack of tagging access and capability For additional information on these and other critical Etagging issues please visit OATIs Etag Information Page at etag Frank Billington OATI Manager of Customer Services

RE OATI Etag TrainingPST Cara Portland will be Tuesday Sept with hospitality suite evening of Sept barring major unforeseen circumstances with the venue When it is contractually locked I will post registration forms for Portland ETS popup announcements will accompany all major additions to the Workshops schedule page on our corporate web site Frank Billington IV OATI Manager of Customer Services Original Message From Semperger Cara mailtoCara NRONcom Sent Tuesday July AM To Subject RE OATI Etag Training I am interested in the training in Portland Oregon Please let me know ASAP when this venue is booked Cara Semperger West Power Scheduling Supervisor Original Message From mailto Sent Monday July PM To Semperger Cara Subject OATI Etag Training OATI is proud to demonstrate our Etag readiness to the industry by announcing training dates and locations for Etag Orientation Workshops to be held around the US and Etag HandsOn Training sessions to be held at the OATI Data Center in Minneapolis Please visit our corporate Internet site by clicking the OATI logo in your ETS toolbar or by going to and enter the Workshops area to find more information or to register for one of our Etag events At this time Baltimore and Minneapolis oneday Etag Orientations are available for registration Please watch for the imminent addition of Portland OR Phoenix AZ Atlanta GA Orlando FL and Houston TX as additional Etag Orientation sites as those facilities finish confirming their availability to us Several HandsOn Sessions at the OATI Data Center are currently available for registration and additional sessions will be posted as necessary to meet demand If you have any questions please contact Frank Billington at or email Frank Billington OATI Manager of Customer Services
